web_search.name: web_search
web_search.description: Search the web for information on a given topic. Returns top results with URLs, titles, and snippets. Use this for market research, competitor analysis, or finding current information.

extract_data_from_url.name: extract_data_from_url
extract_data_from_url.description: Extract and parse content from a given URL. Returns the main text content and metadata. Useful for analyzing competitor websites, blog posts, or market reports.

url.description: The URL to extract data from

store_context.name: store_context
store_context.description: Store information in the context memory for later use by this or other agents. Use this to save important findings, decisions, or data that might be needed later.

key.description: Unique identifier for this context item

retrieve_context.name: retrieve_context
retrieve_context.description: Retrieve previously stored context by key. Use this to access information saved by you or other agents.

key.description: The key of the context item to retrieve

call_analyst_agent.name: call_analyst_agent
call_analyst_agent.description: Call the Analyst Agent for market research, competitive analysis, and opportunity identification. Use this when you need data-driven insights, market sizing, competitor intelligence, or to identify growth opportunities.

task.description: The specific task or question for the Analyst

context.description: Additional context (product info, target market, etc.)

call_growth_hacker_agent.name: call_growth_hacker_agent
call_growth_hacker_agent.description: Call the Growth Hacker Agent for customer acquisition strategies, growth experiments, and scaling tactics. Use this when you need growth strategies, experiment designs, viral mechanics, or rapid scaling plans.

task.description: The specific task or question for the Growth Hacker

context.description: Additional context (current metrics, goals, resources, etc.)

call_sales_machine_agent.name: call_sales_machine_agent
call_sales_machine_agent.description: Call the Sales Machine Agent for sales copy, conversion optimization, and offer design. Use this when you need landing pages, email sequences, objection handling, or persuasive sales assets.

task.description: The specific task or question for the Sales Machine

call_system_builder_agent.name: call_system_builder_agent
call_system_builder_agent.description: Call the System Builder Agent for process documentation, automation workflows, and scaling playbooks. Use this when you need SOPs, process maps, automation designs, or operational systems.

task.description: The specific task or question for the System Builder

context.description: Additional context (current processes, pain points, etc.)

call_brand_builder_agent.name: call_brand_builder_agent
call_brand_builder_agent.description: Call the Brand Builder Agent for content creation, thought leadership, and audience engagement. Use this when you need blog posts, social content, SEO strategy, or authority-building content.

task.description: The specific task or question for the Brand Builder

context.description: Additional context (brand voice, audience, topics, etc.)

request_human_approval.name: request_human_approval
request_human_approval.description: Request human approval for high-stakes decisions like financial commitments >$1,000, major strategy pivots, or legal matters. Returns approval status.

research.description: Tools for gathering information from external sources

memory.description: Tools for storing and retrieving context across agents

governance.description: Tools for approval workflows and compliance
